sentences: Lisa Shihoten (born in Chicago, Illinois) is an American violin soloist, chamber musician and teacher.
A member of the critically acclaimed Jupiter Symphony Chamber Players, Shihoten is an active and significant presence in New York City's classical music scene.
A graduate of The Juilliard School and Yale University, she made her Avery Fisher Hall debut in 1995 performing Bruchâ€™s Scottish Fantasy with The Juilliard Orchestra under Kurt Masur.

She is married to organist Ken Cowan and was teaching violin at Princeton University, also a guest instructor at the Betty Haag Academy of Music in Chicago, where she has the great honor of working with her childhood violin teacher, Betty Haag-Kuhnke.
